article_title: Digital Disruption Inspires Both Fear and Hope
article_text: Security and regulatory concerns have limited health care providers’ use of offshore IT services, but pressure to reduce costs is prompting them to find ways to leverage the offshore model while safeguarding sensitive data.

twitter.description: Emerging technologies represent a tantalizing opportunity for companies to innovate, but technology executives admit their hopes are tempered by fear.
twitter.title: Digital Disruption Inspires Both Fear and Hope
